channel.title: Hello everybody
channel.description:
Hi all, My name is Jordan Hunt. I am currently attending the Art Institute of California: Orange County for learning game development. I am in my first year (just started actually 3 days ago). My cousin informed me of this website explaining to me it would be a great community and that I could expect
blunt & truthful feedback on my projects
. I will probably be posting mostly in the Game Development section. A little more about me, I love playing/making games. For the PC I mainly play Minecraft, Shadowgun Deadzone, Dungeon Hunter 4, and Asphalt 8. As for my XBOX360 I love Battlefield 4, and Minecraft mainly. Anyways, I'm glad to be here and hope I can contribute to this community. Nice to meet you all.

item.title: Hello everybody
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:12, topic:538737”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=657569.msg4398851#msg4398851 date=1389994933]
Welcome to Moparscape I am your local pedo user.
[/quote]While everyone jokes about being a pedophile, this guy is the real deal. And he thinks it’s funny.

Welcome.[/quote]I never said it was funny I said I was the local pedo of the forum which I find to be a fairly accurate statement considering opinion of several members of the community.

Read full topic

[/quote]
Be sure to check out our community whitelist server. PM the slacker above me for whitelist access.[/quote]Will do.

And thanks everybody else for the welcome!

item.description:
@Jordan_Hunt wrote:

Hi all,

My name is Jordan Hunt. I am currently attending the Art Institute of California: Orange County for learning game development. I am in my first year (just started actually 3 days ago). My cousin informed me of this website explaining to me it would be a great community and that I could expect

blunt & truthful feedback on my projects
.

I will probably be posting mostly in the Game Development section.

A little more about me, I love playing/making games. For the PC I mainly play Minecraft, Shadowgun Deadzone, Dungeon Hunter 4, and Asphalt 8.

As for my XBOX360 I love Battlefield 4, and Minecraft mainly.

Anyways, I’m glad to be here and hope I can contribute to this community. Nice to meet you all.
